snippet.title: Woah Dave! Deluxe Trailer
snippet.description:
Woah Dave! Deluxe is a massive (and free!) update to Choice Provisions' hit game Woah Dave! Its features include:

* Two new levels, each of which will challenge even the best Woah Dave! players to rethink their strategy
* New characters in the form of:
- Adoma (of Destructamundo fame)!
- Jr. Melchkin (of BIT.TRIP fame)!
- CommandgirlVideo (of BIT.TRIP fame)!
- Mr. Robotube (of Robotube Games fame)!
- BlokTom (of Bloktonik fame)!
- Plus a new, hidden character. Find them if you can!
* Boss battles!
* New enemy types!
* Rideable UFOs!
* A “Classic Mode” for all those Woah Dave! purists who would prefer their game remain unchanged!
* Maybe a few additional Easter eggs…!

A huge amount of work went into making Woah Dave! Deluxe a worthwhile update for players. Tears were shed. Minds were blown. And being totally honest, I think we learned a thing or two about ourselves along the way.

**Check out what critics have to say about Woah Dave!**

"Arcade Perfection." -Gamezebo

"Woah Dave! is a must." -TouchArcade

"There's hours of arcade fun, strange charm, and game design science here." - Destructoid

http://woahdave.com
http://totallychoice.com
http://twitter.com/totallychoice
